Set emoji: with an emoji for the component, i.e.: --- name: Fancy Button emoji: üéâ --- ### Frontend Design Plan for Family Health Software #### I. Overall Layout **Navigation Bar**: - **Logo**: Located at the top-left corner. Clicking on it returns to the home page. - **Navigation Menu**: Includes ‚ÄúHome,‚Äù ‚ÄúFamily Members,‚Äù ‚ÄúHealth Data,‚Äù ‚ÄúHealth Advice,‚Äù and ‚ÄúSettings.‚Äù - **User Information**: Displays the current user's avatar and nickname at the top-right corner. Clicking on it opens a drop-down menu containing the ‚ÄúLog Out‚Äù option. **Main Content Area**: - The content of different functional modules is displayed according to the navigation menu selection. - Each module has a clear title and operation area. **Footer**: - Displays copyright information and contact details. #### II. Functional Module Design **1. Login/Registration Page** **Page Layout**: - **Title**: Displays ‚ÄúLogin‚Äù or ‚ÄúRegistration.‚Äù - **Form Area**: - Username/Email input box. - Password input box (the registration page includes a confirm password input box). - Verification code input box (optional). - Login/Register button. - ‚ÄúForgot Password‚Äù link (on the login page). - Link to switch to registration/login. - **Bottom Prompt**: Displays links to the registration agreement and privacy policy. **Interaction Design**: - Clicking the login button validates the input information and redirects to the main interface. - Clicking the registration button completes the registration process and logs in automatically. - The ‚ÄúForgot Password‚Äù link redirects to the password reset page. **2. Family Member Management Page** **Page Layout**: - **Title**: Displays ‚ÄúFamily Member Management.‚Äù - **Operation Area**: - Button to add a family member. - Search box for searching family members. - **Member List Area**: - Displays information such as the family member's name, age, gender, and relationship. - Each member has an ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù and ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù button next to them. **Interaction Design**: - Clicking the ‚ÄúAdd Family Member‚Äù button opens a form to fill in the new member's information and save it. - Clicking the ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù button opens a form to modify the member's information. - Clicking the ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù button opens a confirmation dialog box, and the member is deleted after confirmation. **3. Health Data Input Page** **Page Layout**: - **Title**: Displays ‚ÄúHealth Data Input.‚Äù - **Select Family Member**: A drop-down menu to choose a family member. - **Data Input Form**: - Date picker. - Input boxes for weight, height, blood pressure, blood sugar, heart rate, etc. - Submit button. - **Data List Area**: - Displays records of health data that have been entered, with the ability to sort by date. **Interaction Design**: - After selecting a family member, their historical health data is displayed. - Clicking the submit button validates the data format and saves it to the records. - The data list supports delete and edit operations. **4. Health Advice Page** **Page Layout**: - **Title**: Displays ‚ÄúHealth Advice.‚Äù - **Select Family Member**: A drop-down menu to choose a family member. - **Health Advice Area**: - Generates diet, exercise, and medical advice based on health data. - Suggestions are displayed in card format, with detailed content for each suggestion. **Interaction Design**: - After selecting a family member, health advice is automatically generated based on their health data. - Suggestion content supports expand and collapse operations. **5. Settings Page** **Page Layout**: - **Title**: Displays ‚ÄúSettings.‚Äù - **Personal Information Area**: - Displays the user's avatar, nickname, contact information, etc. - Edit button to modify personal information. - **Log Out Button**: - Logs out the current user. - **User Agreement Area**: - Displays links to the user agreement and privacy policy. **Interaction Design**: - Clicking the edit button opens a form to modify personal information. - Clicking the log out button returns to the login page. #### III. Interaction Details **Navigation Bar**: - Clicking on a navigation menu item switches to the corresponding functional module page. - The currently active menu item is highlighted. **Form Validation**: - Input boxes validate data formats in real-time and display error messages. - The submit button is only clickable after data validation is passed. **Popup Design**: - Operations such as adding, editing, and deleting are completed through popups. - Popups have a close button and a mask layer. Clicking on the mask layer closes the popup. **Responsive Design**: - The page supports different screen sizes and is compatible with mobile phones, tablets, and desktops. - Media queries are used to adjust layout and styles. **Loading State**: - A loading animation is displayed when data is being loaded to avoid a blank screen during user wait times. #### IV. Visual Design **Color Scheme**: - **Primary Color**: Light blue (representing health and freshness). - **Secondary Colors**: White, light gray, and green (for health advice). - **Button Color**: Dark blue (to highlight operations). **Font Design**: - Use simple and legible sans-serif fonts, such as ‚ÄúArial‚Äù or ‚ÄúHelvetica.‚Äù - Titles are bold to highlight. **Icon Design**: - Use simple SVG icons, such as user avatars, add buttons, and edit buttons. - Icon colors match the primary color scheme. **Layout Style**: - The overall page layout is simple and avoids excessive decoration. - Use a card layout to display health advice and data records to enhance user experience. #### V. User Experience Optimization **Operational Convenience**: - Common operations (such as adding family members and entering health data) are located at the top of the page or in conspicuous positions. - Provide keyboard shortcuts (such as pressing the Enter key to submit forms). **Data Visualization**: - Health data supports chart display (such as line charts and bar charts) to facilitate trend viewing for users. **Feedback Mechanism**: - Display clear prompt messages (such as popups or top-of-page notification bars) when operations are successful or fail. **Privacy Protection**: - Clearly inform users of data usage and protection methods on the settings page.
